column4: Well can anyone help me with my No Sound problem if i fix that ill be happy and leave yall alone lol
what do you mean by no sound ?
I cant hear anything in ubuntu...Like when i try to play music
has it ever worked?
Btw i have all the gstreamer plugins and stuff it shows that its playing just cant hear it and i have ubuntu restricted extras
has it ever worked?
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/alsa-driver/+bug/156930   <<Try this
what are the results of the tests??
and what were the sound levels?
master doesnt have a bar Pcm Max Mic Max
are they all 100% ?
Well Not all of them like Caller ID And Off Hook I turned them up...
the link I sent you said to unmute everything and put it to 100%
nothing was muted everything was at max that could be changed
it's either muted or your speakers are problematic.  try a pair of headphones in the jack, if you think it isn't muted
well ive had sound before but i was using a diffrent kernal..
if the kernel messed it up, then you would not see the device, unless it was some very unusual sound card
Well as soon as i loaded that other kernal before the sound worked from the start..
I remember a week ago helping you with your sound issue.  You're still having problems?
Yep... And this is a new install cept i got rid of the wubi part lol i started to put my wubi install on the partion but i didnt want anything to do with it so i made a swap and 15GB partion..
Didn't you save the configuration you made when you got the sound working before
I install -rt and it fixed it once but doesnt work anymore
